accepted_name.name: Gerres oyena
accepted_name.author: (Forsskål, 1775)
accepted_name.distribution: Indo-Pacific: Red Sea, Persian Gulf and East Africa, possibly including Seychelles, to the southeastern coasts of India and around Sri Lanka; elsewhere, extending to the western Pacific.
